lead_paragraph: The collapse of the crane, which was being used in the construction of the bridge’s replacement, snarled traffic and left at least four people with minor injuries.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Joseph Berger, Emma G. Fitzsimmons, Jesse McKinley, Noah Remnick, Rick Rojas and Ashley Southall.

headline.print_headline: ‘Nothing Short of a Miracle’: No Serious Injuries in Tappan Zee Crane Collapse
headline.main: ‘Nothing Short of a Miracle’: No Serious Injuries in Tappan Zee Crane Collapse

snippet: The collapse of the crane, which was being used in the construction of the bridge’s replacement, snarled traffic and left at least four people with minor injuries....
abstract: Crane being used to construct replacement for aging Tappan Zee bridge collapses onto highway in Rockland County, NY, stranding motorists but causing no fatalities or serious injuries.
